headline: Mizuho Upgrades Applied Materials (AMAT) to Outperform on Global WFE Tailwinds
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Buzzing AI Stocks on Wall Street. On January 27, Mizuho analyst Vijay Rakesh upgraded the stock from Neutral to Outperform with a price target of $370.00. The firm sees robust global WFE tailwinds for AMAT. Being the number 2 WFE supplier, Mizuho sees AMAT benefiting from accelerating US/Taiwan/JP […]
